tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool converts RNA sequences (with U nucleotides) to DNA sequences (replacing U with T). It also provides an option to convert the output to uppercase or lowercase.
**Input**
A FASTA file containing RNA sequences.
**Output**
A FASTA file containing the converted DNA sequences.
**Example**
RNA input::
>Example_Sequence AUGCUUGUAACCGCUAAGGAU
DNA output::
>Example_Sequence ATGCTTGTAACCGCTAAGGAT
